job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: The Junior Software Engineer assists in design, develops code, tests, installs and maintains application systems, based on per-defined requirements for programs, functions, services, and other related software components. Responsibilities Assists in design solutions for approved projects and change requests of moderate complexity and risk Assists in design of software technicians based on provided detailed requirements Assists in the develop, document and present design solutions and supporting rationale Assists in early stages of system analysis and programming activities Participate in application and program code according to business and technical requirements Convert basic specifications into equivalent infrastructure and application software structures Code and unit test as part of a development team Submit software products for review of compliance with best practices, standards, and enterprise architecture (code review) Participate in quality assurance and testing to achieve quality objectives Participate in quality assurance and testing activities according to planned schedules Learn, use, and gain experience with testing tools and techniques Perform technical support activities required for execution of test plans Perform root cause analysis and defect correction as indicated by test results Evaluate outcomes, report results and document findings according to current standards Basic Qualifications Bachelor’s in Computer Science or related field 2 years of IT experience in application development Concept of programming languages .Net and Microsoft Stack technology Preferred Qualifications Domain Driven Architecture Azure Cloud
